Trigger.name: panic
Trigger.script:
if tonumber(matches[2]) > HP_panic and tonumber(matches[2]) > 10 then disableTrigger("panic") enableTrigger("healing")
if autoEnterTrigger ~= nil then bg("DarkGreen") echo("enabling "..tostring(autoEnterTrigger)) bg("black") enableTrigger(autoEnterTrigger) end end

Trigger.name: healing
Trigger.script: hp = matches[2] if tonumber(hp) >= HP_healthSpell and tonumber(hp) < HP_autoEnter then if HP_maheAvail then send("cast mihe;rest") elseif HP_miheAvail then send("cast mihe;rest") else send("rest") end disableTrigger("healing") tempTimer(7, [[enableTrigger("check health")]]) echo("Healing until "..HP_autoEnter.."\n") else if tonumber(hp) > HP_autoEnter then disableTrigger("healing") enableTrigger("check health") checkHealth(hp) end end

Trigger.name: hunting
Trigger.script: target = matches[1] send("attack " .. target) enableTrigger("huntingHold") disableTrigger("hunting") disableTrigger("Name_Line") disableTrigger("Exit_Line")

Trigger.name: auto enter NewHaven
Trigger.script: if tonumber(matches[2]) >= HP_autoEnter then autoEnterTrigger = "auto enter NewHaven" tablePreps["newhaven"]() end

Trigger.name: auto Stroll Slums
Trigger.script: if tonumber(matches[2]) >= HP_autoEnter then autoEnterTrigger = "Stroll Slums" if current_room ~= 289 then echo("Loop must start at Slum Street Crossroads\nLoop will be unpaused\n") walkLoop_pause = false else walkLoop_count = 1 walkLoop_run = true walkLoop_pause = false walkLoop(slumsLoop) end end disableTrigger("auto Stroll Slums")

Trigger.name: SlumHunting
Trigger.script: walkLoop_pause = true disableTrigger("Name_Line") disableTrigger("Exit_Line") disableTrigger("SlumHunting") enableTrigger("SlumHold") send("attack " .. matches[1])

Trigger.name: Name_Line
Trigger.script:
--handle list if matches[1]:findPattern("Quantity") ~= nil then disableTrigger("Name_Line") tempTimer(1, [[enableTrigger("Name_Line")]]) return end if matches[1]:findPattern("%d") ~= nil or matches[1]:find("You") ~= nil or matches[1]:find("you") ~= nil then return end
disableTrigger("Name_Line") enableTrigger("Exit_Line") loc = split(matches[1],",") land = string.trim(loc[0]) room = string.trim(loc[1])
if manual_map then return end
--if table.size(loc) == 0 then enteredRoom(matches[1],nil) --else -- enteredRoom(room,land) --end

Alias.name: Auto Enter Arena
Alias.script:
--disable any existing auto enters autoEnterTrigger = nil for key,value in pairs(tableAutoEnter) do disableTrigger(value) end
--enable correct auto enter enableTrigger(tableAutoEnter[matches[2]])

Alias.name: Moved
Alias.script:
last_movement = matches[2]
if manual_map then enteredRoom("",nil) else send(matches[2]) end

Alias.name: Panic HangUp
Alias.script: echo("Panic hangup changed from "..tostring(HP_panicHangup).." to "..matches[2].."\n") HP_panicHangup = matches[2]

Alias.name: Disable Town

Script.name: MM
Script.script:
------------------------------------------------- -- Put your Lua functions here. -- -- -- -- Note that you can also use external Scripts -- -------------------------------------------------
autoEnterTrigger = nil maxHP = 0
function health(hp, direction) if tonumber(hp) <= HP_panic or tonumber(hp) < 10 then walkLoop_run = false if direction ~= nil then send(direction..";rest") changeRoom(direction) disableRetreats() disableTrigger("check health") enableTrigger("panic") if HP_panicHangup then disconnect() end end bg ("red") echo ("PANIC!") bg ("black") end
if tonumber(hp) < HP_retreat and tonumber(hp) > HP_panic then echo("RETREAT!") walkLoop_pause = true if direction ~= nil then send(direction) changeRoom(direction) end send("rest") disableRetreats() enableTrigger("healing") if autoEnterTrigger ~= nil then bg("DarkGreen") echo("Enabling "..tostring(autoEnterTrigger)) bg("black") enableTrigger(autoEnterTrigger) end end
if tonumber(hp) > maxHP then maxHP = tonumber(hp) end HP = tonumber(hp) setGauge("HP", hp, maxHP, "HP: "..HP.."/"..maxHP) end
walkLoop_run = false --keep stepping through loop walkLoop_pause = false --temporarily stop running steps walkLoop_count = 1 --current step
function walkLoop(loop) if not walkLoop_pause and HP > HP_autoEnter then send(loop[walkLoop_count]) last_movement = loop[walkLoop_count] walkLoop_count = walkLoop_count + 1 if walkLoop_count > table.size(loop) then walkLoop_count = 1 end end
if walkLoop_run then changeRoom(last_movement) disableTrigger("Name_Line") tempTimer(4,function() walkLoop(loop) end) else enableTrigger("Name_Line") end end
function disableRetreats() disableTrigger("retreat up") disableTrigger("retreat east") disableTrigger("retreat reverse") end

Script.name: Enter
Script.script:
------------------------------------------------- -- Put your Lua functions here. -- -- -- -- Note that you can also use external Scripts -- -------------------------------------------------
function enterNewHavenArena() HP_panicHangup = false disableTrigger("huntingHold") enableTrigger("hunting") echo("hunting enabled\n") disableTrigger("auto enter NewHaven") last_movement = "d" send("d") end
function strollSlums() HP_panicHangup = true enterCommon() disableTrigger("SlumHold") enableTrigger("SlumHunting") echo("hunting enabled\n") end
function disableSlums() disableTrigger("SlumHold") disableTrigger("SlumHunting") end
function enterCommon() disableTrigger("healing") disableTrigger("check health") echo("check health disabled\n") enableTrigger("retreat reverse") echo("retreat enabled\n") end

Script.name: Tables
cleric
Script.script:
------------------------------------------------- -- Definition of cleric specific variables. -- -------------------------------------------------
--When should panic set in? HP_panic = 10 --Should I hang up of panic? HP_panicHangup = true --When should I retreat from room? HP_retreat = 20 --When should I start using health spells? HP_healthSpell = 25 --Which health spells are available? HP_maheAvail = false HP_miheAvail = true --When can I automatically re-enter battle? HP_autoEnter = 35

Script.name: paladin
Script.script:
------------------------------------------------- -- Definition of paladin specific variables. -- -------------------------------------------------
--When should panic set in? HP_panic = 10 --Should I hang up of panic? HP_panicHangup = true --When should I retreat from room? HP_retreat = 25 --When should I start using health spells? HP_healthSpell = 20 --Which health spells are available? HP_maheAvail = false HP_miheAvail = true --When can I automatically re-enter battle? HP_autoEnter = 35

Script.name: Ranger
Script.script:
------------------------------------------------- -- Definition of paladin specific variables. -- -------------------------------------------------
--When should panic set in? HP_panic = 10 --Should I hang up of panic? HP_panicHangup = true --When should I retreat from room? HP_retreat = 20 --When should I start using health spells? HP_healthSpell = 20 --Which health spells are available? HP_maheAvail = false HP_miheAvail = false --When can I automatically re-enter battle? HP_autoEnter = 40

Script.name: UI
Script.script:
------------------------------------------------- -- Put your Lua functions here. -- -- -- -- Note that you can also use external Scripts -- -------------------------------------------------
WindowWidth, WindowHeight = getMainWindowSize(); createConsole("chat", 9, 57, 20, WindowWidth-415,0) createGauge("HP", 100, 25, WindowWidth-520, 0, "HEALTH", "green")
local HBox = Geyser.HBox:new({name="HBox", x=WindowWidth-415, y=WindowHeight-400, width=400, height=400,}) local mapper = Geyser.Mapper:new({name = "mapper"},HBox)
function resizeEvent( event, x, y ) WindowWidth, WindowHeight = getMainWindowSize(); -- move chat window moveWindow("chat",WindowWidth-415,0) if WindowHeight-400 < 200 then resizeWindow("chat",400,WindowHeight-400) end
moveWindow("HP",WindowWidth-520,0) HBox:move(WindowWidth-415,WindowHeight-400) end
registerAnonymousEventHandler("sysWindowResizeEvent", "resizeEvent")

Script.name: mapping
Script.script:
------------------------------------------------- -- Put your Lua functions here. -- -- -- -- Note that you can also use external Scripts -- -------------------------------------------------
mudlet = mudlet or {}; mudlet.mapper_script = true
registerAnonymousEventHandler("setPlayerLoc", "setPlayerLocation") registerAnonymousEventHandler("sysLoadEvent", "mapStartup")
function mapStartup() last_movement = nil current_room = nil manual_map = false auto_map = false
loadMap() addMapEvent("I'm Here", "setPlayerLoc") echo("Default map loaded\n")
disableRetreats() enableTrigger("check health") end
function setPlayerLocation(evet, list, rm) setRoom(rm) last_movement = nil enableTrigger("Name_Line") disableTrigger("Exit_Line") end
function doSpeedWalk() auto_map = false disableTrigger("Name_Line") echo("Path we need to take: " .. table.concat(speedWalkDir, ", ") .. "\n") echo("Rooms we'll pass through: " .. table.concat(speedWalkPath, ", ") .. "\n") for i,v in ipairs(speedWalkDir) do tempTimer(i, [[send("]]..v..[[")]]) end tempTimer(table.size(speedWalkPath) + 2, [[enableTrigger("Name_Line")]]) setRoom(speedWalkPath[table.size(speedWalkPath)]) end
function enteredRoom(room_name,area_name) if current_room == nil then local room_list = searchRoom(room_name) if table.size(room_list) == 1 then for rid,rname in pairs(room_list) do setLocation(rid) end else echo("I don't know where I am\n") end else exits = getRoomExits(current_room) if table.contains(exits,longDirection(last_movement)) then local rid = exits[longDirection(last_movement)] setRoom(rid) if getRoomName(rid) == "" then setRoomName(rid,room_name) end else if auto_map or manual_map then createRoom(room_name,area_name) else echo(" - Room not found\n") end end end end
function createRoom(room_name,area_name) if area_name == nil then if current_room == nil then echo("can't find an area for the room\n") return else area_name = getRoomAreaName(getRoomArea(current_room)) end else addAreaName(area_name) current_room = nil end
pos_table = getRoomsByPosition(findAreaID(area_name),targetPosition()) if table.size(pos_table) ~= 0 then rid = pos_table[0] setExit(rid,current_room,inverseDirection(last_movement)) setExit(current_room,rid,last_movement) setRoom(rid) return end
rid = createRoomID() addRoom(rid) setRoomName(rid,room_name) setRoomArea(rid,findAreaID(area_name)) setRoomCoordinates(rid,targetPosition())
if current_room ~= nil then setExit(rid,current_room,inverseDirection(last_movement)) setExit(current_room,rid,last_movement) end
setRoom(rid) echo("Room "..room_name.." ("..rid..") created\n") end
function changeRoom(direction) exits = getRoomExits(current_room) if table.contains(exits,longDirection(last_movement)) then local rid = exits[longDirection(last_movement)] setRoom(rid) end end
function setRoom(room_id) current_room = room_id centerview(room_id) end
function describeRoom(room_id) echo("Room "..room_id.." - "..getRoomName(room_id).." in area "..getRoomAreaName(getRoomArea(room_id)).."\n") end
function mapControl(inst) if inst == "save" then saveMap() echo("default map saved\n") elseif inst == "load" then loadMap() updateMap() echo("default map loaded\n") elseif inst:find("delete") ~= nil then if inst:find("all") ~= nil then local list = getAreaTable() for area, id in pairs(list) do deleteArea(id) end current_room = nil last_movement = nil echo("all map areas deleted\n") elseif inst:find("area") then aname = inst:sub(13,inst:len()) aid = findAreaID(aname) if aid ~= nil then deleteArea(aid) echo("area "..aname.." deleted\n") else echo("area "..aname.." does not exist\n") end elseif inst:find("room") then rid = inst:sub(13,inst:len()) if roomExists(rid) then deleteRoom(rid) echo("room "..rid.." deleted\n") else echo("room "..rid.." does not exist\n") end end elseif inst:find("create") ~= nil then if inst:find("area") ~= nil then aname = inst:sub(13,inst:len()) createRoom("",aname) echo("area "..aname.." created\n") end elseif inst:find("describe") ~= nil then if inst:find("room") ~= nil then rid = inst:sub(15,inst:len()) if roomExists(rid) then describeRoom(rid) else echo("room "..rid.." does not exist\n") end end elseif inst:find("rename") ~= nil then if inst:find("room") ~= nil then rname = inst:sub(13,inst:len()) if current_room ~= nil then setRoomName(current_room,rname) describeRoom(current_room) else echo("I don't know where I am.\n") end end elseif inst:find("where am i") then if current_room ~= nil then describeRoom(current_room) else echo("I don't know where I am.\n") end elseif inst == "manual on" then manual_map = true auto_map = false echo("manual mapping enabled\n") elseif inst == "manual off" then manual_map = false echo("manual mapping disabled\n") elseif inst == "auto on" then auto_map = true manual_map = false echo("auto mapping enabled\n") elseif inst == "auto off" then auto_map = false echo("auto mapping disabled\n") else echo("Map command not found\n") end end
function inverseDirection(direction) if direction == "n" then return "s" elseif direction == "s" then return "n" elseif direction == "e" then return "w" elseif direction == "w" then return "e" elseif direction == "ne" then return "sw" elseif direction == "nw" then return "se" elseif direction == "se" then return "nw" elseif direction == "sw" then return "ne" elseif direction == "u" then return "d" elseif direction == "d" then return "u" end end
function longDirection(direction) if direction == "n" then return "north" elseif direction == "s" then return "south" elseif direction == "e" then return "east" elseif direction == "w" then return "west" elseif direction == "ne" then return "northeast" elseif direction == "nw" then return "northwest" elseif direction == "se" then return "southeast" elseif direction == "sw" then return "southwest" elseif direction == "u" then return "up" elseif direction == "d" then return "down" end end
function targetPosition() if current_room == nil then return 0,0,0 else x,y,z = getRoomCoordinates(current_room)
if last_movement:find("n") ~= nil then y = y + 2 end if last_movement:find("s") ~= nil then y = y - 2 end if last_movement:find("e") ~= nil then x = x + 2 end if last_movement:find("w") ~= nil then x = x - 2 end if last_movement:find("u") ~= nil then z = z + 2 elseif last_movement:find("d") ~= nil then z = z - 2 end
return x,y,z end end
function findAreaID(areaname) local list = getAreaTable()
-- iterate over the list of areas, matching them with substring match. -- if we get match a single area, then return it's ID, otherwise return -- 'false' and a message that there are than one are matches local returnid, fullareaname for area, id in pairs(list) do if area:find(areaname, 1, true) then if returnid then return false, "more than one area matches" end returnid = id; fullareaname = area end end
return returnid, fullareaname end
function split(str,c) aCount = 0 array = {} a = string.find(str, c)
while a do array[aCount] = string.sub(str, 1, a - 1)
aCount = aCount + 1 array[aCount] = string.sub(str, a + 1, string.len(str)) a = string.find(array[aCount], c) str = array[aCount] end return array end
